narrative.narrative: Transmile Air Services is a cargo airline based at Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport in Subang,Malaysia near Kuala Lumpur. It started in 1993 with a 737-200 and a Cessna 208. It would use several more 737's in the years following. In 2000 they began using 727's on behalf of DHL. They got four MD-11's in 2005 and had those until 2011. In January 2015 it had three 727's running for DHL. It also has a subsidiary in Bangkok,Thailand called K-Mile Air that had two 737-400's which has been around since 2006. It had one in Jakarta,Indonesia called Megantara Air from 2007 to 2009 also. In 2009 Malaysia Airlines announced its intention to acquire a Transmile maintenance base which included 2 hangers,the needed equipment,and skilled manpower. It also did cargo service on behalf of Air Macau from 2002 to 2006. It serves as of around May 2015 four other domestic destinations,Hong Kong,Manila,Singapore and Ho Chi Minh,Vietnam. Its division in Bangkok serves Singapore,Hochiminh and Jakarta. Transmile also does charters and wet leases.
